name: Paranoid (itch)
description:
Paranoid - A point and click story

Update!

Patch: Credits now listed in description! To replay, please refresh the page!

V.1.1 7/5/2017

  • Credits in ending added
  • Added text boxes on page navigation
  • Slower mirror cutscene
  • Loading sprite added in phone menu

(FULL SCREEN FOR BEST RESOLUTION)

(Also please allow time for the layouts to load! It's high in memory, so the game probably isn't broken, it's just loading!)

After watching a scary video, Hani's anxiety is set off and needs to find a way to calm down.

It's your job to help her relax and see that there's nothing to be afraid of.

Made for my major improvement project at uni.
